address: Xã Mỹ Chánh, Huyện Phù Mỹ, Tỉnh Bình Định
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Mỹ Chánh"**

Okay, so the user wants to know the current administrative unit for "Xã Mỹ Chánh, Huyện Phù Mỹ, Tỉnh Bình Định." My first step is to recognize the old province, "Tỉnh Bình Định." Then, I need to check for any province mergers using resolution 60-NQ/TW. Ah, yes, I remember that "Tỉnh Bình Định" was merged with "Tỉnh Gia Lai" to form "Tỉnh Gia Lai."

Now, focusing on the specific "Xã Mỹ Chánh," I'll search through the relevant resolutions, particularly those related to the reorganization of administrative units within "Tỉnh Gia Lai." After some searching, I found it in resolution 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15. This resolution clearly states that "Xã Mỹ Chánh" (along with "Mỹ Thành" and "Mỹ Cát") has been reorganized into a new ward called "**xã An Lương**."

Now that I have the new ward name, "xã An Lương," I'll look it up in the list of new wards to get its code and ensure the information is correct. And there it is! I've found "xã An Lương" with the code "21769" under the province "Tỉnh Gia Lai." This is a straightforward mapping, as the resolution directly addresses the consolidation. My confidence level is very high in this determination. Now, I'll structure the output as JSON for the user.

citation.header: 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Gia Lai
citation.line: 10. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Mỹ Chánh, Mỹ Thành và Mỹ Cát thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã An Lương.
